findings.title: State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the `constant` keyword to ensure that their values cannot be changed after being set.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide for naming conventions, which can affect readability and maintainability.

findings.title: Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The `pragma solidity` version is not locked, which may allow the contract to be compiled with an unexpected version, potentially introducing vulnerabilities.
